Item Name: Clorox 2 Laundry Stain Remover and Color Booster, Free and Clear, 66 Ounces
Description:
• One 66 ounce bottle of Clorox 2 Laundry Stain Remover and Color Booster Powder, Free and Clear
  • Removes stains and whitens and brightens clothing, even delicates
  • Made without dyes or perfumes, ensuring gentleness for sensitive skin
  • Extends the life of clothes by keeping colors bright and stain free
  • Safe for HE and standard washing machines
Long Description: Clorox 2 Laundry Stain Remover and Color Booster, Free and Clear, helps keep clothes looking newer, longer. The special formula boost colors without the use of dyes and perfumes. It has 2x the color brightening power and removes 4x more stains with pretreating than using detergent alone. This stain remover is safe for all loads, both color and washable fabrics.  To remove dried and set in stains, pretreat prior to wash. Add to every wash load with detergent for color brightening power and total clean. It can be used in standard and high efficiency washing machines. Keep clothes bright and looking new with Clorox 2 Laundry Stain Remover and Color Booster, Free and Clear.
Directions: For color boosting power and a total clean, fill cap to line 1 for HE machines or regular loads, or fill to line 2 for extra-dirty or large loads. For best results, pretreat to remove stains from clothes. Apply Clorox 2 directly to tough stains like grass, dirt and ink. Rub in gently and set 5 to 10 minutes. Do not allow to dry on fabric. Wash with Clorox 2 and detergent.
Ingredients: Hydrogen peroxide, nonionic surfactant and fabric brightening agent. Contains no phosphorus. Contains biodegradable cleaning agents. Not harmful to septic systems.
Safety Warnings: This stain remover and color booster is an eye irritant. Do not get in eyes. If contact with eyes occurs, flush with water for 15 minutes. If irritation persists, call a doctor. If swallowed, drink a glassful of water. Call a doctor or poison control center. Keep out of reach of children.
